examples.title: Modelo: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: A blue furry creature in the scene is constantly stirring a steaming pot of soup. Then, the blue creature blows on the pot, causing the soup in the bowl in front of it to freeze into a block of ice.

examples.title: Modelo: Hailuo

examples.title: Modelo: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: In the scene, a small dog emits a blue light from its eyes. Afterward, the blue light in the dog's eyes fades away.

examples.title: Modelo: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: A cat in the scene runs quickly toward the camera, with white electric sparks emanating from its eyes.
